name: projects/1017425675889/locations/europe-west3/instances/a099fd02-80fc-4a0f-a80c-fb5d7fe78564/rules/ru_f3016baf-aae9-499f-8e4f-ba3e3e84d6cc
text:
rule Suspicious_powershell_command_execution {


  meta:
   
    author = "TCS Cloud MDR COE team"
    description = "Suspicious powershell command execution"
    severity = "High"
    type = "alert"
    mitre_attack_tactic = "Initial access"

  events:
    $e.metadata.product_event_type= "4688" or $e.metadata.product_event_type= "1"
    $e.principal.process.command_line = "powershell.EXE"
    $e.target.process.command_line = "notepad.EXE" or $e.target.process.command_line="word.EXE" or $e.target.process.command_line="excel.EXE"

  outcome:
    
    $risk_score = 70

  condition:
    $e
}
author: TCS Cloud MDR COE team
